# 1
 We must find the difference between the two probabilities
 
P(Y=y) = P(Y≤y) - P(Y≤y-1) = [(k-y+1)/k]^n - [(k-y)/k]^n

Thus:
P(Y=y) = [(k-y+1)^n - (k-y)^n]/k^n


# 2a
```{r}
cat("Prob not failing 8 yrs geometric=", (9/10)^8, "\n",
    "Expected=", 10, "\n",
    "SD",sqrt((1-1/10)/(1/10)^2) )

```


# 2b
```{r}
cat("Prob not failing 8 yrs exponential=", exp(-8/10), "\n",
    "Expected=", 10, "\n",
    "SD",10) 

```



# 2c
```{r}
cat("Prob not failing 8 yrs exponential=", dbinom(0,8,0.1), "\n",

```
